column2: we were looking to celebrate a birthday and enjoy a nice steak with no reservations in mind. Thankfully
column3: Bavette's hold a few tables for walk-in
column4: and considering it was only 5 p.m. or so on a Sunday
column5: we were able to be seated immediately. We had been debating other options
column6: but after a previous visit here
column7: we knew we couldn't go wrong with the food and the ambiance.
